title: PGP.Desktop.Professional.v9.5.0.Multilingual.Incl.Patch.and.Keym
description:
PGP Desktop Professional provides comprehensive security for   
individual desktops, making it possible for organizations to  
protect sensitive information for a single person without     
changing the existing IT infrastructure or disrupting work    
processes. This award-winning, easy-to-use solution encrypts  
email, files, virtual volumes, and entire disks from a single 
desktop application.                                          
                                                               
 NEW Features in PGP 9.5:                                      
 - PGP NetShare offers comprehensive filesharing management    
 - PGP Whole Disk now features partition encryption and        
 Single-Sign on,                                               
 which allows the synchronization of your Windows password     
 with your PGP                                                 
   Whole Disk Encryption passphrase.                           
 - Resizable Virtual Disks now automatically expand to fit     
 their contents.
